about_the_game: This game unfolds against a soft pink backdrop, offering players a light and enjoyable gaming experience. After the game starts, various medals and coins, including gold, silver, bronze medals, diamonds, and gold coins, will rise from the bottom of the screen. Players need to use the mouse to quickly click and collect as many of these items as possible. The game is set with a time limit, encouraging players to maximize their score within the given time frame. A crisp and pleasant sound effect plays each time an item is successfully collected, adding more fun to the game. The game interface is clean and aesthetically pleasing, with a light and lively background melody, making it perfect for players looking to unwind. By continuously challenging oneself, players can attempt to break their personal best scores, enjoying the sense of achievement that comes with the game.

name: Molest

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-9600K / AMD Ryzen 5 2600
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 980 / AMD Radeon RX 590 / Intel Arc A750
